prompts.text:
You are a [role] with deep expertise in [domain].  
Here is my idea:  
  "[your idea in one sentence]"  
My goal is to achieve:  
  "[specific outcome or metric]."
prompts.title: Position your expertise

prompts.text:
You are an analytical critic.  
Review the idea above and list:  
1. Top 3 risks with brief explanations  
2. Top 3 missed opportunities with brief explanations  
Format your answer as a numbered list.
prompts.title: Obstacle identification

prompts.text:
You are an innovation expert.  
Ignoring all constraints, describe the ultimate version of my idea.  
â€¢ List 5 bold enhancements  
â€¢ Explain why each enhancement adds value
prompts.title: Wildcard expansion

prompts.text:
You are a marketing specialist for [audience description].  
How would you adapt my idea to make it irresistible to them?  
â€¢ Propose 3 targeted adjustments  
â€¢ For each, explain the psychological trigger it leverages
prompts.title: Empathy targeting

prompts.text:
You are a top 0.01 percent performer in [domain].  
Outline a step-by-step implementation plan (5 steps).  
â€¢ Include estimated timelines  
â€¢ Define 2-3 key metrics to track success
prompts.title: Refinement plan
